message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $10,000 is a tempting offer, the value this product brings is considerably higher.  How about we settle at $11,500?
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250? Can you consider that?
